title: "Your account has been transferred to another region." PROBLEM
body: Hi. I'm having problem with login into LoL. I play on EUNE server but today "your account has been transfered to another region". I'm now writing from my 2nd account which has the same ID and PSWD, but region is different. My EUNE summoner name is Dzyzas. Also I was not able to find the new region of my account. It just says it has been changed but I tried to login on ALL possible servers and it is always the same error. Sorry for mistakes in English.

replies.body:
It sounds like your account may have been compromised. I recommend reaching out to our Account Specialists via a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Select "I need help recovering my account" and fill out as much info as you can recall about your account.

Let me know if you have any questions.

As with my main account, its been transfered from NA to EUW, 200$ charged from my paypal which is currently on dispute, and dont get me wrong, i want my account back, but even if i can't get that much from this, i'm god damn not paying for this

The same thing had just happened to me 
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/WiRQJiNv-i-cannot-log-into-my-main-account
That's my post about it

SAME MY ACCOUNT WAS TRANSFERRED TO ANOTHER REGION AND MY PAYPAL ATTACHED TO MY ACCOUNT HAS BEEN CHARGED $200

Riot support is taking forever to respond as usual and they have no phone number to contact either...
We've been pretty bombarded with tickets recently. We're not trying to leave you behind, and we'll be with you as soon as we can.
Ofc I did not change it :/
